text: At a crowded meeting of the Paris Academy of Sciences, Louis Daguerre demonstrated the process of making photos called daguerreotypes.

Philo Farnsworth was born on Indian Creek in Beaver County, Utah. He would grow up to inspire the beloved professor character on Futurama. He also gets credit for Inventing the first completely electronic television.
Gordon Bell was born in Kirksville, Missouri. He would grow up to help build PDP computers and oversee the development of DEC's VAX series.
